function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of insufficiently fitted face masks","Impact":"Increases the spread of droplets and viruses, contributing to the transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Proper education and training on how to wear and fit face masks, and regular inspection of mask quality","Technologies":"AI for monitoring mask fit and quality, and educational tools for proper mask usage","People":"General public, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Insufficient data sharing during COVID-19 outbreak in smart city networks","Impact":"Ineffective management of outbreak data, leading to delayed response and potential spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Establishing clear protocols for data sharing, incentivizing data collaboration, and ensuring privacy protection","Technologies":"Secure data sharing platforms, blockchain for data integrity, and data anonymization techniques","People":"Researchers, public health agencies, and technology development teams","Owner":"Government agencies, data management organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate detection and prediction of disease spread in urban areas","Impact":"Fail to identify potential hotspots for disease transmission, leading to uncontrolled spread in urban environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced AI-based disease prediction models, real-time data monitoring, and early warning systems","Technologies":"Big data analytics, AI algorithms for disease prediction, and IoT sensors for real-time data collection","People":"Urban residents, local health authorities, and government agencies","Owner":"City administrations, health organizations"}]}
